attributes.action: Start a petition to help Royal Mail employees as bosses want to cut hours
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to help as the bosses of Royal Mail are not taking any notice of there employees and would like the public to support them as they have been on the frontline during this virus putting themselves in danger I know there have been postal workers that have died from it and many have been effected by it Royal Mail are using this as excuse to cut yours to save money they should be looking after there employees  not cutting hours to save money
attributes.background: Help the Royal Mail staff fight to stop the Royal Mail bosses cutting there hours and using the pandemic as an excuse when they where planning on doing it along time ago they should be looking after there employees not cutting hours

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Royal Mail is a private company and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
